page.title: 19ATTITUDES.
page.content:
There is a close village community in Harlestone and Church Brampton and it was evident in the surveys carried out, that local people enjoyed the friendly atmosphere. New residents are welcomed as a way of maintaining the population and therefore the existence of the villages but have the usual "reservations".
{SOCIAL CONCERNS} There are plans to build a new golf course in Harlestone if planning permission is granted.Despite creating more employment it could also cause the eviction of some people. There are suggestions by the council to open a disused quarry for tipping. The Parish Council and residents of Harlestone are worried about problems from vermin and "fly tipping".
